# rtx_interface_mac_acl (Resource)

Manages MAC ACL bindings to an interface on RTX routers. This resource applies MAC address access lists to interfaces for Layer 2 filtering.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface` (String) Interface name (lan1, lan2, bridge1, vlan1, etc.)

### Optional

- `mac_access_group_in` (String) Inbound MAC access list name
- `mac_access_group_out` (String) Outbound MAC access list name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
